short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified when your favourite artist drop an album. You'll never miss a release again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resonance is an extension for Music lovers to check out the latest albums by their favourite artists and even get notified when they release one.
